* BrightBlade looked over the ridge and saw two Predacons coming towards 
them, they had been spotted!
She turned to Gangon.*

" Prepare for battle, we have company!"

* BrightBlade transformed into her robot mode and pulled out a pulse pistol, 
she loaded it and looked in the direction that the attackers were coming 
from.
Just to screw up her attackers she pulled out twi small devices from a 
compartment in her leg, she handed one to Gangon.*

" Activate this, it'll cloak your energy signature. Then go and hide behind 
a tree and I'll hide behind another. We may be able to get the drop on 
them."

* After whispering this she activated her device and stuck it on her hip, 
with that done she climbed up into the bushy branches of a near by tree. She 
now silently waited for her attackers to come into firing range!*
